point_1.title: Introduction
point_1.description: Introduce the main character, the setting, and the beginning of the adventure. Incorporate the magical object and the mentor.

details.beginning_adventure: Describe the start of the adventure here

point_2.title: Rising Action
point_2.description: Describe the journey and the challenges faced by the main character. Highlight the theme of courage and the guidance of the mentor.

details.mentor_guidance: Describe how the mentor guides the main character

point_3.title: Climax
point_3.description: Present the central conflict or battle in a mysterious and gothic setting. Emphasize the character's quest and the tone of the story.

details.central_conflict: Describe the central conflict or battle here

point_4.title: Falling Action
point_4.description: Show the resolution of the conflict and how the main character's courage leads to victory. Include the magical object's role in the outcome.

details.conflict_resolution: Describe how the conflict is resolved
details.character_courage: Explain how the character's courage leads to victory
details.magical_object_role: Detail the role of the magical object in the outcome

point_5.title: Resolution
point_5.description: Conclude the story with the transformation of the setting and the mentor's acknowledgment of the main character's growth. Maintain a sense of mystery and accomplishment.

details.setting_transformation: Describe the transformation of the setting
details.mentor_acknowledgment: Explain how the mentor acknowledges the main character's growth
details.final_tone: Maintain a sense of mystery and accomplishment
